#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Hole.

== Name ==

*[CHole Hole]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Hole (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Description of a hole on a course: Media (photographs, videos, sketches...), notes and/or placemarks.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  name = xs:string  
            *number = [SOneToEighteen OneToEighteen]*
          >  ([CMedia media] | [CNote note] | [CPlacemarks placemarks])`*` </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CMedia golfml:Media] || [CMedia media] ||  					Associated media: Picture, video, document, link...				 ||
|| [CNote golfml:Note] || [CNote note] ||  					Localised note or comment about the hole.				 ||
|| [CPlacemarks golfml:Placemarks] || [CPlacemarks placemarks] ||  					List of places worth of interest on the hole.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| name ||  Name of hole || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| number ||  Hole number || [SOneToEighteen golfml:OneToEighteen] || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHoles Holes]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Hole">  <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">    <xs:element name="media" type="golfml:Media">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="note" type="golfml:Note">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="placemarks" type="golfml:Placemarks">    </xs:element>  </xs:choice>  <xs:attribute name="number" type="golfml:OneToEighteen" use="required">  </xs:attribute>  <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string">  </xs:attribute></xs:complexType>
----
